overview: Michael, a senior in college, is stressed out and overwhelmed by the fact that he's about to graduate and enter the real world soon. In order to graduate, he has to have an internship lined up. His dad, John, has been constantly on him about this, among other things, and this has created tension in their relationship. Nearing the internship deadline, Michael, his dad, and also his grandfather go on a camping trip and sort out their differences.
tagline: Can I have the life I've always wanted?
title: The Talk
